hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
UPDATE EO_ORDER EOOR SET EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_CODE = :eoorStatusCode, EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_NAME = :eoorStatusName, EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_REMARK = :eoorStatusRemark, EOOR.EOOR_OFFSET_REASON = :eoorOffsetReason, EOOR.EOOR_UNDO_QUANTITY = :eoorUndoQuantity, eoor.Eoor_Undo_Volume = :eoorUndoVolume, eoor.Eoor_Undo_Gross_Weight = :eoorUndoGrossWeight
WHERE EOOR.EOOR_ID IN (:eoorIds)
